ygData.subject: Re: Triggerhappy
ygData.msgSnippet: Ho ya, for the first time in 300 years some action, hard action, mean action. Oh yeah Wildrider screams arriving at the base in robot mode flying behind

Date: Fri, 16 Feb 2001 22:30:49 -0700
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: Triggerhappy
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

"Ho ya, for the first time in 300 years some action, hard action, mean
action. Oh yeah" Wildrider screams arriving at the base in robot mode
flying behind Triggerhappy, (when they got to the ocean he transformed and
flew). He pulled out his scattershot gun, filling the ground and the base
with laser fire. From behind him, Drag Strip zooms to the ground and turns
around, converting to race car mode. He then speed towards the base opening
fire with his 2 Plasma-energy blaster firing twice. As he speed on he yells
to Triggerhappy, "Uh who exactly are we attacking?"
